heroSection.title:
Festival
Committee of
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about the festivals in Roquetes is just a click away.

aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.description: The Festival Committee of Roquetes is an independent, non-political, non-profit organization responsible for organizing festivals and events in the town of Roquetes in Tarragona. Here you can find all the information about upcoming events and much more.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Want to participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and participate in setting up the festivals and events that take place throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoying all the events of the year, which also includes entry to the townâ€™s main festival each year.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the annual crew contest.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: <2>Click here</2> to see the requirements for participating in the crew contest or <1>here</1> to register as a member.
